Class StreamServer

java.lang.Object

java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
StreamServerImpl
public abstract class StreamServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

This server provides to subclasses a constructor for communication between the * server and the application, so that the server may take from the producer the data generated
